name: Planet Factory
description:
Competitive factory building RTS set in space. Build factories using resources from your randomly generated planet to build units and gather materials. In the game you can explore other planets, expand your empire and battle against other civilisations in order to win. Play games with up to 8 players in free for all or teams.

This game and all assets were made in 2 months for the #GamesInnovationChallenge.

Jude Birch - Programming / Game Design

Elias Lassalle - Modelling / Game Design

Freddie Clarke  - Music / Sound Effects

How to play:

  • Each player starts with a city and a worker, you can select your worker with left click.
  • You can then order your units to create factories, which in turn will create more units.
  • Left click on planets in the bottom right to go to them.
  • Right click on another planet whilst having a unit selected to order them to travel to that planet.

 You can order combat units to attack other team's combat units.

Crafting Recipes:

  • Footman1 - Iron Ingot + Bread
  • (Mine iron ore with a Ore Miner near an ore vein)
  • (Use a Coal Smelter or Wood Smelter. Input the ore as well as the respective fuel source.)
  • Footman2 - Footman1 + Copper Cable + Iron Frame
  • Copper cable = Copper
  • Footman3 - Footman2 + Gunpowder + Aluminum plate
  • Aluminum plate = Aluminum (on Moon)
  • Iron frame = Iron ingot + Glass
  • Vehicle1 - Basic Engine + Iron frame
  • Basic engine = Iron
  • Advanced2- Vehicle1 + Gunpowder + Copper Cable
  • Gunpowder = On Moon - Explosive ore
  • Ship1 - Advanced Engine + Copper Cable + Iron Frame
  • Advanced Engine = Gold
